Name: Percentage of Request Payment that occur after Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Number of Request Payment activities in cases that previously included Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Number of 'Request Payment' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Percentage of Request Payment out of all Request Payment and Payment Handled activities
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Number of Request Payment events preceded by Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Number of 'Request Payment' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Percentage of Request Payment that are not dismissed (i.e., followed by Payment Handled)
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Percentage of Request Payment from all activities occurring after any rejection step
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Number of Request Payment with case:Amount above 100 euros
Metric: Number of 'Request Payment' activities > 100 where ma is the last value of case:Amount

Name: Number of Request Payment grouped by case:BudgetNumber
Metric: Number of 'Request Payment' activities

Name: Percentage of Request Payment that follow a variant containing Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR followed by Request Payment
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Request Payment'

Name: Percentage of Request Payment that occur in variants without any rejection activity
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all cases where 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' does not happen

Name: Number of Request Payment in relation to Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: Number of 'Request Payment' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' occurs

Name: Percentage of Request Payment among all activity executions in the log
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all cases

Name: Number of times Request Payment is performed across all cases
Metric: Number of 'Request Payment' activities

Name: Percentage of Request Payment done after Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Average number of Request Payment per completed reimbursement case
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Request Payment'

Name: Percentage of Request Payment that occur in variants where Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER appeared earlier in the same case
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Ratio of Request Payment over Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Fraction of Request Payment that are eventually followed by Payment Handled
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Percentage of Request Payment occurring in the most frequent variant (Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE → Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION → Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR → Request Payment → Payment Handled)
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Number of Request Payment in cases that required re-submission due to any rejection (including Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER)
Metric: Number of 'Request Payment' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Percentage of Request Payment that occur within two months of the initial Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Ratio of Request Payment occurrences in variants with no rejections versus variants with at least one rejection (especially Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER)
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of Request Payment executed by SYSTEM resource
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all cases

Name: Number of Request Payment made per year (2017 vs 2018)
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'count': activity == 'Request Payment'", 'aggregation': 'total', 'group_by': 'time:timestamp'}"
